name: init_profile
body: let profile = & mut ctx . accounts . profile ;
profile . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
let canonical_bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("profile") . ok_or (error ! (ProfileErr :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let mut seed_hash = profile . owner . to_bytes () [0] as u32 ;

name: charge
body: let profile = & mut ctx . accounts . profile ;
let seeds = & [b"fee_sink" , profile . owner . as_ref () , & [profile . saved_bump]] ;
let derived = Pubkey :: create_program_address (seeds , ctx . program_id) . map_err (| _ | error ! (ProfileErr :: SeedCompute)) ? ;
if derived != ctx . accounts . fee_sink . key ()

let ix = Instruction { program_id : * ctx . program_id , accounts : vec ! [AccountMeta :: new (profile . key () , false) , AccountMeta :: new_readonly (ctx . accounts . user . key () , true) ,] , data : amount . to_le_bytes () . to_vec () , } ;
let signer = & [b"fee_sink" , profile . owner . as_ref () , & [profile . saved_bump]] ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [profile . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info ()] , & [signer] ,) ? ;
profile . credits = profile . credits . saturating_add ((marker % 7) as u32 + 1) ;

fields.name: profile
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 1 , seeds = [b"profile" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: fee_sink
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: fee_sink は手動導出に依存（危険）"]
